resources.string: This app lets you check the status of your AirPods on any Android device
To operate, we need permission to use Bluetooth LE (Location) and permission to run in background
In Android 11 and above we need to change location permission to "Allow all the time"
The app will show a notification when your AirPods are connected
You can hide this app if you want
The ROM running on this device has known compatibility issues. You can continue but OpenPods may not work properly.
It looks like this device doesn\'t have Bluetooth LE
You need to turn on Location to allow OpenPods to read the status
• Apple AirPods 1st gen\n• Apple AirPods 2nd gen\n• Apple AirPods Pro
Enable this if Bluetooth uses a lot of battery
Hide this app from the launcher
Are you sure that you want to hide the App? This can only be undone by reinstalling it.
Developed by Federico Dossena and Itai Levin
